title: Proclamation configuration file schema
description: This schema describes the configuration file format for the Proclamation tool. The root object can either be a project_object, or contain a 'projects' key with an array of project_object

section_object.title: Section
section_object.description: A section contains changelog fragments. The key associated with the section is the section name.

directory.title: Fragment Directory
directory.description: Relative path to directory with changelog fragments

sort_by_prefix.title: Sort by Prefix
sort_by_prefix.description: If true, fragments will be sorted by a colon-delimited prefix in their content (after the normal sorting by reference), or by their first word if no colon is found in the text.

project_name.title: Project Name
project_name.description: Used in the heading of the default template

base_url.title: Project base URL
base_url.description: Source code repo base URL, used by default template to construct links to issues and merge/pull requests

insert_point_pattern.title: Insert point pattern
insert_point_pattern.description: Regex matching the line in your NEWS file that we should insert before.

template.title: NEWS file release template
template.description: A path to a Jinja2 template to use when generating new NEWS file updates. The default file is bundled with Proclamation itself.

extra_data.title: Extra Data
extra_data.description: Any extra data you want to pass through to the template.
